text: I’m heartsick for the victims of last night’s massacre in Las Vegas & their loved ones.
If you are trying to locate a loved one in Las Vegas, call 1-866-535-5654.
We are not powerless against such evil. We must take common sense, widely supported, steps to reduce such violence, agony and grievous loss.
We must do everything we can to stop guns from falling into the hands of people who shouldn't have them and save innocent lives.
My thoughts are with the families and friends of the victims and all those wounded in the horrific Las Vegas shooting.

RT @ABC Georgia high school football team runs out onto the field carrying American flags in what the superintendent calls a "unifying moment." http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DLFdNNxXUAERLWf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/914614273653035009/vid/480x480/t7RDijn_RR9wx20X.mp4
Our hearts break for the victims and their families and our thoughts are with those wounded, after the horrific Las Vegas shooting.
#Enough already. We've witnessed this atrocious episode far too many times. We must act -- and act NOW to prevent gun violence.
RT @CoryBooker My soul aches over Las Vegas. My prayers are with the victims. And my prayers are with our nation, may we resolve to do more stop such evil.
Horrified by the Las Vegas shooting. My heart is heavy this morning. Praying for the victims and their families.
It should be clear that we have got to do everything we can to stop guns from falling into the hands of people who should not have them.
Thoughts & prayers are NOT enough. Not when more moms & dads will bury kids this week, & more sons & daughters will grow up without parents.
I’m heartsick for people in Nevada & across the country who woke up to this news & are worried that their family & friends are ok.

Lifting up in prayer all impacted by last night's despicable shooting in Las Vegas & all 1st responders on the scene https://www.reviewjournal.com/local/the-strip/more-than-20-killed-100-wounded-in-las-vegas-strip-shooting/
Tragic news out of Las Vegas this morning. Kelley and I send our prayers and deepest condolences to all those affected.
My soul aches over Las Vegas. My prayers are with the victims. And my prayers are with our nation, may we resolve to do more stop such evil.
I also want to thank the first responders who did an outstanding job responding to this tragedy, saving many lives.
It is not enough to ask how could someone do this. We must also ask ourselves how can I prevent something like this from happening again.

Praying for the victims and first responders in Las Vegas and our country right now. This shooting was a horrible and cowardly act.

“The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is that good people should do nothing.”
Our hearts are in Las Vegas. We are beyond horrified at the heartless tragedy that has claimed the lives of dozens, injured hundreds.
There have been more mass shootings than days this year. It is long, long overdue for Congress to take action on gun safety.
Be strong & steadfast have no fear or dread of them 1/2
Last night’s attack is the deadliest mass shooting in our country's modern history. This year there have been more mass shootings than days.
